bill_title: Recognizing the University of South Dakota women's basketball team for winning the Summit League regular season championship.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Recognizing the University of South Dakota women's basketball team for winning the Summit League regular season championship WHEREAS, the University of South Dakota women's basketball team won the Summit League regular season championship; and WHEREAS, the USD women achieved a 16-0 record during the regular season; and WHEREAS, this was the second time in three years that South Dakota has been undefeated in league regular season play: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the University of South Dakota women's basketball team is honored and commended for their outstanding display of teamwork and is congratulated for their outstanding accomplishments.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Recognizing the University of South Dakota women's basketball team for winning the Summit League regular season championship. WHEREAS, the University of South Dakota women's basketball team won the Summit League regular season championship; and WHEREAS, the USD women achieved a 16-0 record during the regular season; and WHEREAS, this was the second time in three years that South Dakota has been undefeated in league regular season play: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the University of South Dakota women's basketball team is honored and commended for their outstanding display of teamwork and is congratulated for their outstanding accomplishments.
